name: Coots' Crucible
description:
Controls: WASD (don't use the arrow keys, I completely forgot about them.)

ESC: Settings, music volume, full screen, exit game.

Left click to select upgrades and hit buttons.

Coots' Crucible is  my attempt at a Vampire Survivors-type game, made for LudwigJam 2023. The theme of the jam was "Coots" and "Ten Minute Games." Coots is Ludwig's adorable cat, and ten minute game is pretty self explanatory.  The game was made in 9 days using Gdevelop, and I had a great time learning this genre. Coots' Crucible currently has:

6 Weapons , 3  upgrades per weapon(Except for one with no upgrades.)

6 Passives,  5 different enemies, 1 boss, 1 cute little cat.

TIPS/MINOR SPOILERS

Standing in the blackhole makes you immune while it's visible. This is was just a work around to an issue I was having, but I like it, so it stays. 

There may be a bug with some of the upgrades. If you are offered the same passive, that is not a food passive, odds are it won't do anything. 

If you have any issues or concerns, please let me know down below and I'll respond when I can. Thanks for playing and good luck to the other participants!
